button: inline-flex items-center justify-center filter-hover bg-gray-800  text-white text-xs leading-none font-medium border border-transparent rounded focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-offset-white focus:ring-gray-900 focus:outline-none transition-colors duration-200
buttonPrimary: inline-flex items-center justify-center default-bg filter-hover text-white text-xs leading-none font-medium border border-transparent rounded focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-offset-white focus:ring-gray-900 focus:outline-none
link: filter-hover transition-all bg-clip-text text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-600 to-indigo-600 dark:from-purple-400 dark:to-indigo-400
